localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: With Batch Styler editing multiple styles in Figma becomes way easier: Change all your color & typography styles at once, changing details like hue or font family within seconds.
blogPost.body: With Batch Styler editing multiple styles in Figma becomes way easier: Change all your color & typography styles at once, changing details like hue or font family within seconds.
blogPost.title: Batch Styler for Figma - Change multiple Color / Text Styles at once
blogPost.author: Jan Six

localize.description: 有了Batch Styler，在Figma中编辑多种风格变得更加容易。一次性改变所有的颜色和排版风格，在几秒钟内改变色调或字体系列等细节。
localize.tagline: 一次性改变多种颜色/文字风格

localize.description: 有了Batch Styler，在Figma中編輯多種風格變得更加容易。一次性改變所有的顏色和排版風格，在幾秒鐘內改變色調或字體系列等細節。
localize.tagline: 一次性改變多種顏色/文字風格

previous.excerpt: Squat is also called full squat. It is one of the most complex and practiced movements in bodybuilding. It is also a movement in powerlifting competitions. This is an app that automatically records the number of squats through sensors.
previous.title: Daily Squat Workout App - Fitness app to track your squat workout

localize.description: 蹲式也叫全蹲。它是健美比赛中最复杂、练习量最大的动作之一。它也是力量举比赛中的一个动作。这是一款通过传感器自动记录下蹲次数的应用。
localize.tagline: 追踪你的下蹲训练的健身应用

localize.description: 蹲式也叫全蹲。它是健美比賽中最複雜、練習量最大的動作之一。它也是力量舉比賽中的一個動作。這是一款通過傳感器自動記錄下蹲次數的應用。
localize.tagline: 追蹤你的下蹲訓練的健身應用

next.excerpt: We have built a tool for developers and businesses in Africa to engage thier customers via different messaging channels like SMS,Voice,Email,Whatsapp We currently have built APIs for devs to integrate and working on no-code tools for business owners.
next.title: Sendchamp - Multi-channel messaging tool for devs & businesses in Africa

localize.description: 我们已经为非洲的开发人员和企业建立了一个工具，通过不同的消息渠道，如短信，语音，电子邮件，Whatsapp吸引客户。
localize.tagline: 为非洲的开发人员和企业提供多渠道信息传递工具。

localize.description: 我們已經爲非洲的開發人員和企業建立了一個工具，通過不同的消息渠道，如短信，語音，電子郵件，Whatsapp吸引客戶。
localize.tagline: 爲非洲的開發人員和企業提供多渠道信息傳遞工具。
